Row.Text: I am Luo Fangbo, custodian of the Lanfang kongsi. What brings you to our federation?
Welcome, traveler. I am President Luo. The land of Lanfang is open to those who value knowledge and hard work.
Lanfang may be lost, but our efforts will not be forgotten.
So, you choose violence. Lanfang will stand firm against your aggression.
Let us forge a friendship built on hard work and mutual respect, where both our peoples can thrive in freedom and prosperity.
Those who neglect their duty to their people deserve neither respect nor courtesy.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Your disregard for justice has left me no choice but to take action.
Your words are misguided. Lanfang’s strength lies in our unity and the integrity of our people.
{1_MinorCivName:textkey} values those who bring stability and progress. Lanfang will not back down easily.
This proposal must benefit both our peoples, or it is not worth considering.
我是羅芳伯，蘭芳公司的管理者。是什麼風把您帶到我們的聯邦來的。
歡迎，旅人。我是羅總長。蘭芳之地對那些重視知識和勤勞的人敞開大門。
蘭芳或許已失，但我們的努力不會被遺忘。
原來你選擇了暴力。蘭芳將堅決抵抗你的侵略。
讓我們建立一個以勤勞和互相尊重為基礎的友誼，讓我們的人民在自由和繁榮中共同成長。
那些忽視對人民責任的人，既不值得尊重也不配得到禮遇。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]（[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]他們竟公開指責我們！注意：您並未與之開戰。[ENDCOLOR]）
你對正義的漠視已迫使我不得不採取行動。
你的話言不及義。蘭芳的力量在於我們的團結和人民的正直。
{1_MinorCivName} 重視帶來穩定與進步的人。蘭芳不會輕易退讓。
這項提議必須對我們雙方都有所益，否則不值得考慮。
